trips.name: Eric V
trips.description: Encahnted rock is a Big rock that you hike up that takes 30mins, I dont go on vactaion much

trips.name: Paola
trips.description: One of the last places I last visited was my mother's hometown of Rojas de Cuauhtémoc. Here My grandma was giving me a tour of where her hens tend to lay their eggs. The trick is too look in the baskets.

trips.name: Charlie
trips.description: When I visited Wayward Ranch Animal Sanctuary, I met this pig!
